title: Dr. David Sinclair on How to Reverse Aging & Live to 150!
itunes:title: Dr. David Sinclair on How to Reverse Aging & Live to 150!
description:
On this week's episode of Mindset Mentor, Expert Series! Dr. David Sinclair, biologist, professor of genetics, and co-director of the Paul F. Glenn Center for the Biology of Aging at Harvard Medical School, drops by to discuss the wonders of the body and his pivotal studies on the human aging process.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
